H0.text: Other than a film soundtrack, which pop album has spent most weeks in the UK Album Charts in total. Thriller by Michael Jackson

H1.text: Other than a film soundtrack, which pop album has spent most weeks in the UK Album Charts in total. Back to Black by Amy Winehouse

H2.text: Other than a film soundtrack, which pop album has spent most weeks in the UK Album Charts in total. Rumours by Fleetwood Mac

H3.text: Other than a film soundtrack, which pop album has spent most weeks in the UK Album Charts in total. Song for the asking

A4.text: As of November 2023, Rumours has spent over 1,000 weeks in the top 100 of the UK Albums Chart.
